original: Ahlqvist, Per David, konstnär, Lju-garn, f. 16/10/00 i Visby av Emil A. o. Helga Medin. G. 42 m. Thyra Gott-berg. Stud. v. Carl Wilhelm-sons’ mà- larsk. i StMm 18-21, konsthögsk. 27-31. Etsare o. målare (landskap o. porträtt). Repr. å Nat :mus. m. etsn. Ordf. i Gotl. hembygdsförb. sed. 41. Skr.: art. i hembygdsvård o. folklivs-skildr. Sign.: D. A. Kanslersmedalj o. Bobergska priset f. etsn.
translated: Ahlqvist, Per David, artist, from Ljugarn, born on October 16th, 1900 in Visby to Emil A. and Helga Medin. Married Thyra Gottberg in 1942. Studied under Carl Wilhelmson at the painting school in Stockholm from 1918-1921 and at the art academy from 1927-1931. A printmaker and painter of landscapes and portraits. His work is represented at the National Museum with etchings. He has been the chairman of the Gotland heritage association since 1941 and has written articles on local preservation and folklore. His signature is "D. A." He has been awarded the Chancellor's Medal and the Bobergska Prize for his etchings.

structured.name: Per David Ahlqvist
structured.description: Printmaker and painter of landscapes and portraits
